text: Taking a quick look at your showreel. The first snow shot (around 10s).... How does that image relate to the rest of the breakdown? Is it used somewhere as a texture or as reference?

Ohh it’s more like a tone, light reference. Since I put this together in 8 weeks I had to rush it the last day on the comp and I first put that background instead of adding more mountains and I haven’t removed it yet, I will have access to my pc this weekend, gotta do some re-renders and change a lot of things and I will update my reel when I like correct that shot(:

Ahh ok. I was watching it and it didn't quite make sense to me. If you were going to have reference in there, might be worth just popping "reference" in the corner just to make sure.
Also, personally, I would put the last shot first, as I think that's one of the stronger ones from your current reel

Do you have any speedtree work you can pop in as well?
I have quite a lot and will render some turntable work from that, going to put that on my list of things to do!
